com.terei.jvector.gui
Class IntDocument

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.text.AbstractDocument
      javax.swing.text.PlainDocument
          com.terei.jvector.gui.IntDocument
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Document
public class IntDocument
extends PlainDocument

This class extends PlainDocument, to override the documents insertString method, to restrict the string to insert to only containing ints, and not letting the input field above it, exceed the length specified.

Since:
16/12/03
Version:
1
Author:
David Terei
See Also:
PlainDocument, Serialized Form

Method Detail

insertString

public void insertString(int offs,
                         String str,
                         AttributeSet a)
                  throws BadLocationException
Overrides PlainDocument's insertString method to restrict only string containing ints to be inserted into the text document.

Specified by:
insertString in interface Document
Overrides:
insertString in class PlainDocument
Parameters:
offs - the starting offset >= 0
str - the string to insert; does nothing with null/empty strings
a - the attributes for the inserted content
Throws:
BadLocationException - the given insert position is not a valid position within the document
See Also:
PlainDocument.insertString(int,String,AttributeSet)
